pageContext.claim: “The headline in the Washington Post was totally inaccurate. The statement wasn't bad in the Post, but the headline was ridiculous, which is -- as I say, that's fake news. And CNN is fake news like crazy, and they had just totally the wrong story, which they knew. They were asked to change it, and they wouldn't do that. And it was false.”
pageContext.analysis: The headline does not appear to have been updated and no corrections are on {the Washington Post story} in question, suggesting it was not “fake” at all. Redfield acknowledged as much when he told the press he was accurately quoted.
